mapper.select: SELECT ES.ESTIID, ES.ESTINAME, ES.MEMID, ES.RESDATE, ES.RESTIME, ES.GUESTNUM, HA.HALLNAME, CA.CATERINGTYPE, STU.STUDIONAME, DR.DRESSNAME, ES.TOTALCOST FROM ESTIMATES ES join HALL HA on ES.hallid = HA.hallid join CATERING CA on ES.cateringid = CA.cateringid join STUDIO STU on ES.studioid = STU.studioid join DRESS DR on ES.DRESSID = DR.DRESSID WHERE ES.MEMID = #{ memid }
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM ESTIMATES WHERE ESTIID = #{ estiid }
